channel.title: #Police on TheTenderForLaw.com Test Deployment

item.title: I'm Not Authorized To Answer Questions
item.description:
You will need this soon, and it may save your life, so PAY ATTENTION.

IF YOU ARE ARRESTED: You DO NOT TALK TO POLICE, and NEVER ANSWER QUESTIONS. If they say “you’re under arrest”, you don’t answer ANY question. Even if it sounds “innocent”.

Police give NOTICE: In United States they say “You are under arrest for Insert made-up bullshit here. You have the right to remain silent, and ANYTHING you say may (That means “will”) be used AGAINST YOU (Notice not HELP you) in a court of law. You have the right to an attorney…” followed by bullshit you should ignore. DO NOT let ANYONE act on your behalf.
